text: Thomas James Acker (March 7, 1930 â€“ January 4, 2021) was an American Major League Baseball pitcher. He was born in Paterson, New Jersey. From 1956 to 1959, he played for the Cincinnati Reds. Acker died on January 4, 2021 in Caernarvon Township, Pennsylvania at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1930 births Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:People from Paterson, New Jersey Category:2021 deaths
title: Tom Acker
